ygData.messageBody:
hehe I love that idea. I've never heard of anyone suggesting that one.
That would be truely usefull and I can't see how it could imbalance the
game if it were to be made a charged item. The only problem is I don't
see how they could possible implement such a thing. All items that have a
special ability are based on magic and there's no magic equivalent to
this. I could see how this could work as a combine/tradeskill based item
if you could put money in an inventory slot and press combine, but I don't
think you can put money in an inventory slot can you?

As a rogue I'd love to have this, I can't even count how many times I've
either dropped or deleted 100s of copper because I was overloaded.
(pickpocketing tends to steal large amounts of copper) Even if it
returned a fraction of the total value of the coins, it would help. Like
put 250 copper in there and get 2 gold back.
